sources.title: Blood Immortal (Love Immortal) | Full Horror Movie
sources.description:
***This film is under license from ITN Distribution. All rights reserved.***

Blood Immortal - Follows three generations of vampire women that find their lives put into jeopardy by their environmental and economic surroundings.

2019
Stars: Aphrodite Nikolovski, Richard Tyson, Jordan Trovillion

metadata.Plot: After cryonically preserving his late wife, 87-year-old pioneer Alan clings to the hope of reuniting with her in the future. But when he discovers newfound love, he must choose between a distant dream and the present.
